summary: REQ-8 branding update appears implemented in the main storefront layout header and in the HTML document title. Footer branding change is claimed in a generated summary file, but the StoreLayout.tsx diff is truncated so the footer change cannot be directly verified from the provided code snippet. Additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced branding and footer change description inside a generated documentation/summary file rather than only making the requested UI/metadata changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 only asks to rename user-visible branding and the HTML <title>; modifying a separate file inventory/summary is not part of the requirement.
REQ-8 does not request changes to project state/feature tracking metadata; only storefront UI and browser metadata branding changes were requested.
